sentences.sContent: My parents want me to stay here, this rebarbative city.
sentences.sContent_eng: My parents want me to stay here, this rebarbative city.
sentences.sCn: 我的父母希望我留在这个令人讨厌的城市里。

sentences.sContent: He became rebarbative and prickly and spiteful; I find his obsequiousness repellent.
sentences.sContent_eng: He became rebarbative and prickly and spiteful; I find his obsequiousness repellent.
sentences.sCn: 他变得令人讨厌、易发怒，怀有恶意；我发现他的奉承令人厌恶。

remMethod.val: re(相对) ＋ barb(钩子) ＋ ative → 钩子对着别人 → 冒犯人的
